title: Hill Climbing Algorithm
description: We need to find the shortest path up the hill to get the best signal for our communicator! It took me SO LONG to implement Djikstra's algorithm for this one, honestly I should have just brute forced it. But oh well, it was fun =) I feel I understand JS classes better now.
result1: Length of shortest path to highest point
result2: Length of shortest path from lowest point to highest
